aboutUsSubtitle: Planner.so is your ultimate travel companion, helping you plan and organize your journeys with ease.
components.error.description: We apologize for the inconvenience. We are working hard to get you back on course.
components.error.subtitle: We are experiencing some turbulence on our end. Our team of expert digital pilots is working to get you back on course.
components.error.title: Oops! Your journey flight has been delayed
faq1Subtitle: Planner.so is your ultimate travel companion, designed to simplify your travel planning. It offers an intuitive platform where you can effortlessly create, organize, and visualize all your trips in one convenient place.
faq2Subtitle: Your first journey is completely free! Enjoy full access to every feature, allowing you to explore the full potential of Planner.so at no cost.
faq2Title: How does the first free trip work?
faq3Subtitle: We accept all major credit cards, securely processed through Stripe to ensure your transactions are safe and hassle-free.
faq4Subtitle: Absolutely! You can update and adjust your itinerary anytime using our flexible and easy-to-use platform.
faq4Title: Can I modify my itinerary after planning?
homepageSubtitle: Create an account and start planning your dream trip now
homepageTitle: Take the Stress Out of Travel Simplify your Journey
journeyBegins: {count, plural, one {day to go} other {days to go}}
mainFeatureExpensesDescription: Stay on top of your budget with a clear overview of your expenses, broken down by day and category for easy management.
mainFeatureJourneyDescription: Start your adventure by creating a personalized journey, tailored to your destination, dates, and budget.
mainFeaturePlanningDescription: Effortlessly add and manage your daily events and expenses, categorized for clear organization and tracking.
name: Name
onboarding.step2.title: When do you plan to go to {destination} ?
onboarding.step3.title: How much do you plan to spend ?
onboardingCreatingJourneyError: An error occurred while creating your journey. Please try again later.

onboardingStep1Title: Where do you want to go ?
onboardingStep2Error: You need to set a valid start and end date
paymentError: An error occurred while creating the checkout session
privacyPolicy.subtitle: At Planner.so, we are dedicated to safeguarding your privacy. This policy explains the information we collect, how we use it, and your rights regarding that information.
privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicyPage.title: Planner.so | Privacy Policy
privacyPolicySection2.description.item1: information about your usage of our website and services. This includes details such as your IP address, browser type, device information, and operating system.
privacyPolicySection2.description.item2: information you provide to us when you register on our website.
privacyPolicySection2.title: Information We Collect
privacyPolicySection3.description: Your information is used to deliver and enhance our services, personalize your experience, and communicate with you effectively.
privacyPolicySection3.title: How We Use Your Information
privacyPolicySection4.description.item1: Request access to the information we hold about you
privacyPolicySection4.description.item2: Request correction or deletion of your personal data
privacyPolicySection4.description.item3: Object to the processing of your data
privacyPolicySection4.description.item4: Restrict how we use your data
privacyPolicySection4.description.item5: Request a copy of your data in a structured format
privacyPolicySection4.description.last: If you have any questions or concerns regarding your privacy, please reach out to us at {email}.
privacyPolicySection4.title: Your Rights
warningChangingDates: If you delete days which have expenses, the expenses will be deleted.
welcome.metaDescription: Plan your journey with Planner.so - your ultimate travel companion
welcome.title: Welcome to Planner.so
